heading: Today
text: Sunshine, mixing with some afternoon clouds.  Highs from the low 20s to low 30s north to south.  Winds light, mainly northwest less than 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Partly cloudy in the evening, then periods of clouds, with a scattered snow showers in the north, south through the mountains. Lows in the single numbers north, 10 to 15 in the Champlain Valley and south.  Winds light, turning to the southwest near 10 mph from the Green Mountains west.

heading: Saturday
text: Morning clouds and passing snow showers in the north and mountains, then periods of afternoon sun.  Partly sunny in southern valleys, becoming mostly sunny.  Highs in the 20s to near 30 north, 30 to 35 south.  Winds light, shifting to the northwest near 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Valentines Day
text: Morning clouds and passing snow showers in the north and mountains, then periods of afternoon sun.  Partly sunny in southern valleys, becoming mostly sunny.  Highs in the 20s to near 30 north, 30 to 35 south.  Winds light, shifting to the northwest near 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph.
